definition: to give a detailed exposition/to state in detail
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: But he goes even further than this.
Said another way, you must base your argument on the city you studied in Assignment 2.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，你必須以作業2所研究的城市做申論基礎。

sentences.english: It consists of a series of essay questions covering the scope of the course.
sentences.chinese: 有一系列涵蓋課程範圍的申論題。

sentences.english: He tripped up on the essay part of the exam.
sentences.chinese: 他在這次考試中，申論題部分答錯了。

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
